org.rapla.mobile.android.widget

Class RaplaCategorySpinner

  • java.lang.Object
    • Spinner
      • org.rapla.mobile.android.widget.RaplaCategorySpinner

  • public class RaplaCategorySpinner
extends Spinner
    The rapla category spinner is a drop-down widget. Clicking the widget opens a a RaplaCategoryChoiceDialog that allows for drilling into the category structure and selecting a category.
    Author:
    Maximilian Lenkeit

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  RaplaCategorySpinner.ApplyOnClickListener
      Listener for the dialog's apply button.
      static class  RaplaCategorySpinner.CancelOnClickListener
      Listener for the dialog's cancel button.
      static class  RaplaCategorySpinner.SpinnerOnTouchListener
      The listener class shows a RaplaCategoryChoiceDialog and thereby allows for selecting a category from the tree.
